role.argrole: thing which becomes manifest of arg0

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (NP (ADJP (JJ 新兴)) (NP (NN 产业))) (NP (NN 经济) (NN 格局))) (VP (VRD (VV 显露) (VV 出)) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 强劲)) (NP (NN 发展) (NN 势头)))))
example.arg: 新兴 产业 经济 格局
强劲 发展 势头

example.parse: (IP (IP-TPC (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-SBJ (NN 棋风)) (VP (VA 飘逸))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 马晓春))) (VP (VV 遇上) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-3)) (NP-SBJ (NN 棋风)) (VP (VA 硬朗))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 日本)) (QP (CD 九) (CLP (M 段))) (NP-PN (NR 依田纪基))))) (PU ，) (QP-SBJ (NP (PN 其)) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 脆弱))) (DEC 的))) (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 面)))) (VP (ADVP (AD 便)) (ADVP (AD 充分)) (VP (VRD (VV 显露) (VV 出来)))))
example.arg: 其 *OP* *T*-1 脆弱 的 一 面
